name: Suggestion
description: You suggest a course of activity (limited to a sentence or two) and magically influence a creature you can see within range that can hear and understand you. Creatures that can't be charmed are immune. The suggestion must sound reasonable. On a failed save, the target follows the described course of action as best it can. The suggestion ends if you or your companions damage the target.

aiContext.prompt: Evaluate the reasonableness of the suggestion '{playerInput}' given the situation. If reasonable, describe the target's compliance.

components.materialDescription: a snake's tongue and either a bit of honeycomb or a drop of sweet oil

effects.description: On failed save, target follows the reasonable suggestion for up to 8 hours; ends if target is damaged or companions harm it.
